alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 24 at 10:45PM MST until June 24 at 11:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 1130 PM MST. * At 1045 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of South Mountain Park to near Estrella Sailport to Maricopa to near Olberg, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 159 and 185. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 143 and 146. AZ Route 87 near mile marker 146. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Maricopa, Estrella, Bapchule, Estrella Sailport, Olberg, Firebird Lake, Sacaton, Mobile, Rainbow Valley, Stanfield and Ak- Chin Village. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
